availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Ireland. Married to Mary Galleger Crawley. Father of Margaret Crawley, Anne Crawley, Mary A Crawley, James Crawley, Sarah Crawley and John Crawley. Railroad worker in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 577
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct 1, p. 397A
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994052, Pendleton County Deaths 1875, p. 2.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7019803, Pendleton County Deaths 1934, File #4950.
